assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course provides an overview of Russian schools of literary studies, introduces classical works and modern research on Russian literature. It allows students to apply theory to specific samples of literary works.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate vene kirjandusteaduslikest koolkondadest, tutvustab klassikalisi ja kaasaegseid uurimismeetodeid vene kultuuriruumis. Võimaldab rakendada teoreetilisi oskussõnu (mõisteid) vene kirjanduse teoste analüüsis.

objectives.en: The seminar introduces students to the basic concepts and methods of the Russian tradition of literary studies, as well as samples of contemporary researches of various types. The course allows students to apply knowledge of the theory of literature to the historical forms of Russian literature.
objectives.et: Seminar tutvustab vene kirjandusteaduse traditsiooni põhimõisteid ja meetodeid, annab ülevaate kaasaegsete uuringute erinevatest tüüpidest. Kursus võimaldab rakendada kirjandusteaduse põhimõisteid vene kirjanduse tekstidel.

learning_outcomes.en:
The student 
- knows the basic concepts of literary studies and is able to understand academic texts in Russian, 
- applies theoretical concepts in the field of Russian literature and is able to conduct academic discussions in Russian,
- can differentiate and use different research methods in his / her studies,
- applies theoretical concepts in research practice, critically evaluates their applicability in different contexts.
